name: Development through unified environment
short_description:
Development through unified environment:
When I started learning web programming, there were a lot of other components I had to look after during the development. For instance, the web server, the front end designer, the database, the back-end server programming language, java script, client side caching. oof, a lot of things. Besides having them installed, the bigger pain was finding their cross dependencies. Along side, maintenance of the dependencies is added to the pain.

An idea struck me if I had something that'll give me everything under a single roof.
